attributes.action: reject proposals to create a single unitary super council in Somerset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Somerset County Council proposes to create a single unitary authority in the county. This "super sized council" would be one of the largest and most remote local authorities in the country with thousands and thousands of citizens for each councillor.  The County Council's proposals would be bad for local democracy, bad for local services and bad for the local economy.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
